comment: /**  * Update the load statistics  *  * @param currentReading the current reading  */
code: /**  * Update the load statistics  *  * @param currentReading the current reading  */ public void update(int currentReading) {     load01 = updateLoad(currentReading, EXP_1, load01).     load05 = updateLoad(currentReading, EXP_5, load05).     load15 = updateLoad(currentReading, EXP_15, load15). }
private double updateLoad(int reading, double exp, double recentLoad) {     return Double.isNaN(recentLoad) ? reading : reading + exp * (recentLoad - reading). }
@Override public String toString() {     return String.format("%.2f, %.2f, %.2f", getLoad1(), getLoad5(), getLoad15()). }
